title: Calming Organic Aromatherapy Blend
author: FinestShops com
cleaned_text: Description This organic blend of essential oils is made with the relaxing combination of organic Bergamot, Mandarin and Ylang Ylang. Made with a convenient to use rollerball applicator, this unique essential oil blend is easy to use, even on the go. Simply roll over your pulse points (located on your wrist, neck or inside of elbow) and enjoy the sweet aroma. Ingredients: Sesame and Mandarin Oil* *Certified Organic
